General.Name: Sinmag Equipment
General.Description: Sinmag Equipment Corporation engages in the manufacture, retail, and wholesale of baking and food service equipment. The company offers bakery equipment, including spiral mixers, divider rounders, moulders, make up lines, sheeters, proofers, cake machines, planetary mixers, deck ovens, proofers, convection ovens, rack and tunnel ovens, slicers, refrigerators, workbenches, food service equipment, and others. It also provides kitchen equipment comprising pizza equipment, combi oven/convection oven/steamer, rotisseries, fryers, Chinese/western kitchen equipment, meat processing and refrigeration equipment, dishwashers, stainless steel sinks and tubes, and showcases. The company sells its products in Taiwan, China, and the United States. Sinmag Equipment Corporation was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 23, Wuquan 6th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
